# Detect Ghost (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]] \[[[Ectomancy Spells|ectomancy]]]

**Level:** [[0 Level Bard Spells|Bard 0]], [[0 Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 0]], [[0 Level Druid Spells|Druid 0]], [[0 Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 0]], [[0 Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 0]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 60 ft.

**Area:** Quarter-circle emanating from you to the extreme of the range

**Duration:** Concentration, up to 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Ghostwalk (WotC), pg. 51

You detect ghosts. The amount of information revealed depends on how long you study a particular area or subject.

*1st Round:* Presence or absence of ghosts.

*2nd Round:* Number of different ghosts.

*3rd Round:* The location of each ghost.
